name: signin
title: Signin
description: A minimalistic signin component designed with React and Tailwind CSS.
author: Reche Soares

files.content:
"use client"; import type React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; const UserIcon: React.FC = () => ( ); const MailIcon: React.FC = () => ( ); const LockIcon: React.FC = () => ( ); const EyeIcon: React.FC = () => ( ); const EyeOffIcon: React.FC = () => ( ); const GitHubIcon: React.FC = () => ( ); const GoogleIcon: React.FC = () => ( ); // Main Component const Signin4: React.FC = () => { const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [fullName, setFullName] = useState(""); const togglePasswordVisibility = () => { setShowPassword(!showPassword); }; return (
{/* Main Card */}
{/* Form */}
{/* Full Name Input */}
setFullName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your full name" className="flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-800 bg-white dark:bg-black px-3 py-2 pl-10 text-sm text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100 placeholder:text-gray-500 dark:placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-950 dark:focus:ring-gray-300 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-white dark:focus:ring-offset-black disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50" />
{/* Email Input */}
setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="name@example.com" className="flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-800 bg-white dark:bg-black px-3 py-2 pl-10 text-sm text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100 placeholder:text-gray-500 dark:placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-950 dark:focus:ring-gray-300 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-white dark:focus:ring-offset-black disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50" />
{/* Password Input */}
setPassword(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your password" className="flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-800 bg-white dark:bg-black px-3 py-2 pl-10 pr-10 text-sm text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100 placeholder:text-gray-500 dark:placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-950 dark:focus:ring-gray-300 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-white dark:focus:ring-offset-black disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50" />
